name: 3D Monster Maze Audio Only
description:
USING HEADPHONES TO PLAY THE GAME IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED.

OVERVIEW

You are stucked in a pitch-black maze occupied by an unknown monster, and the goal is to find the only exit before that monster gets you. 

Though you can barely see anything, sounds will tell their position; sometimes there are walls blocking the way so you may need to make a detour.

Try to survive, and escape this haunted procedural generated maze.

CONTROLS

W to move forward

A to turn left

D to turn right

R to restart when game is over

V to see (cheater!)

A personal project developed at the NYU Game Center for Audio for Digital Games class.
